title: Sekai wa Kimi de Mawatteru
sinopse:
1. Sekai wa Kimi de Mawatteru (The World Revolves Around You)
2. Sekai wa Kimi no Mune no Naka (The World Is in Your Arms)
3. Ese Tokoya Manga (Fake Barbershop Manga)
4. Orokashiku mo Utsukushiku (Foolish and Beautiful)
5. Yasui Tamashii (Cheap Soul)
6. Akarui Mirai (Bright Future)
7. Gokujou Dessert (Exquisite Dessert)
